summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue North from East Thomas Street to the north line of Madison Heights Addition to the City of Seattle, by laying a 6-inch water main thereon with proper connections, etc, in accordance with Resolution No. 103 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
